verses.text: \w Now|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w brought|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w forces|strong="H4264"\w* \w together|strong="H6908"\w* \w at|strong="H2583"\w* Aphek, \w while|strong="H5869"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w camped|strong="H2583"\w* \w by|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w spring|strong="H5869"\w* \w in|strong="H2583"\w* \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*.

\w As|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w Philistine|strong="H6430"\w* \w leaders|strong="H5633"\w* \w marched|strong="H5973"\w* \w out|strong="H5674"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w their|strong="H1732"\w* units \w of|strong="H1732"\w* \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* thousands, \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* men \w marched|strong="H5973"\w* behind \w them|strong="H5674"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* Achish.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w commanders|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w about|strong="H1961"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w* \w Hebrews|strong="H5680"\w*?” Achish replied, “\w Is|strong="H2088"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? \w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w me|strong="H4672"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w defected|strong="H5307"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w fault|strong="H3972"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w him|strong="H4672"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w commanders|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w angry|strong="H7107"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* Achish \w and|strong="H7725"\w* told \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, “Send \w that|strong="H2088"\w* \w man|strong="H2088"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w let|strong="H3381"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w assigned|strong="H6485"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*. \w He|strong="H8033"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w into|strong="H3381"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* only \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w adversary|strong="H7854"\w* \w during|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*. \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w better|strong="H7521"\w* \w way|strong="H2088"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w regain|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w favor|strong="H7521"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w master|strong="H8269"\w* \w than|strong="H3808"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w men|strong="H7218"\w*?

\w Is|strong="H2088"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w about|strong="H5221"\w* whom \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w sing|strong="H6030"\w* \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w their|strong="H5221"\w* \w dances|strong="H4246"\w*: ‘\w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w has|strong="H7586"\w* \w slain|strong="H5221"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* \w thousands|strong="H7233"\w*, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* tens \w of|strong="H5221"\w* \w thousands|strong="H7233"\w*’?”

\w So|strong="H7121"\w* Achish \w summoned|strong="H7121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* told \w him|strong="H7121"\w*, “\w As|strong="H5704"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w lives|strong="H2416"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w upright|strong="H3477"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w seems|strong="H2896"\w* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w march|strong="H3318"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w army|strong="H4264"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w fault|strong="H4672"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*. \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w leaders|strong="H5633"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H6258"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H7451"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w anything|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w displease|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w leaders|strong="H5633"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*.”

“\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*?” \w David|strong="H1732"\w* replied. “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*, \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w going|strong="H4672"\w* \w along|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* enemies \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* lord \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*?”

Achish \w replied|strong="H6030"\w*, “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w as|strong="H5927"\w* \w pleasing|strong="H2896"\w* \w in|strong="H4421"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w as|strong="H5927"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*. \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w commanders|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w said|strong="H6030"\w*, ‘\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w into|strong="H5927"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w us|strong="H3045"\w*.’

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w then|strong="H6258"\w*, \w get|strong="H3212"\w* \w up|strong="H7925"\w* \w early|strong="H7925"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H5650"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, \w along|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H3212"\w* \w your|strong="H6258"\w* master’s \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w who|strong="H5650"\w* \w came|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H3212"\w* \w you|strong="H3212"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w as|strong="H5650"\w* \w soon|strong="H6258"\w* \w as|strong="H5650"\w* \w it|strong="H1242"\w* \w is|strong="H5650"\w* light.”

\w So|strong="H5927"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* men \w got|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w early|strong="H7925"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* land \w of|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*. \w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*.
